com.pureperfect.ferret.vfs
Interface PathElement

All Known Subinterfaces:
Archive, ArchiveEntry, ClassFile, Container, Directory, File, WebDirectory, WebFile
public interface PathElement

A resource on the Virtual File System (VFS). Underlying resources on the file system will be mapped to the following virtual types:

Actual ResourceVFS Type
A directory on the local file systemDirectory
A file on the local file systemFile
A zip, jar or other archive file on the local file systemArchive
A zip, jar or other archive file on the networkArchive
A generic file inside an archiveArchiveEntry
A Java™ class in a directoryClassFile
A Java™ class in an archiveClassFile

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
J. Chris Folsom

Method Summary
 String getFullPath()
          Get the full path, which should be unique on the file system.
 String getName()
          Get the name of this path, relative to its parent.
 Container getParent()
          Get the parent container for this path.
 InputStream openStream()
          Open a stream to this resource.
 

Method Detail

getParent

Container getParent()
Get the parent container for this path.

Returns:
the parent container for this path.

String getName()
Get the name of this path, relative to its parent.

Returns:
the name of this path

getFullPath

String getFullPath()
Get the full path, which should be unique on the file system.

Returns:
the full path, which should be unique on the file system.

openStream

InputStream openStream()
                       throws IOException,
                              UnsupportedOperationException
Open a stream to this resource.

Returns:
the input stream to this resource
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs opening the stream
UnsupportedOperationException - if the resource cannot be opened.
